Title: Pause Task
Description: Pauses a SQL Server Integration Services Control Flow for a specified number of milliseconds, or until a specific time of day.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Pauses a SQL Server Integration Services Control Flow for a specified number of milliseconds, or until a specific time of day.




Please visit the SSIS Community Tasks and Components project on CodePlex for more useful SSIS tools.

The Task can be configured to wait for an elapsed time:



Or delay until a specific time of day:
